name: CVE-2019-19880
description: exprListAppendList in window.c in SQLite 3.30.1 allows attackers to trigger an invalid pointer dereference because constant integer values in ORDER BY clauses of window definitions are mishandled.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sqlite:sqlite:3.30.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:cloud_backup:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:suse:package_hub:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:suse:linux_enterprise:12.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:redhat:enterprise_linux_desktop:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:redhat:enterprise_linux_server:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:redhat:enterprise_linux_workstation:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:opensuse:backports_sle:15.0:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_workbench:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
